SkillDef.description:
Cleaning and Hauling.

Earn XP in the skill by:
(1) Building a Trash Can (from Misc tab). Once built, create a Bill on the Trash Can so your pawns can remove trash bags from the base
(2) making stone blocks
(3) extracting metal from steel slag
(4) destroying weapons, apparel or drugs (using Bills at Campfire or Smelter)
(5) making Chemfuel from wood or organics (from Biofuel Refinery)
(6) cremating corpses
